resources.string: Hey Checkout \‘Chromer\’ for quick and secure browsing experience! Download here https://goo.gl/992ils
Compatible custom tab provider not found

Chromer requires you to have any Custom tab compatible browser on your phone. Currently there are no browsers on your phone that supports it. Would you like to install Google Chrome (Free) from play store? If you already have it, then please update it to latest version.
Could not open custom tab, falling back to normal browsers
Not a supported link, try again
Hello! \nChromer is a light-weight, secure and a fast web browser.
It uses Google Chrome\'s Custom Tabs feature which is an extremely light weight Chrome tab designed for quickly loading a link.
It can keep your browser locked in memory so that your browser launches little faster.
It can scan links on your screen and load them in background to reduce loading times!
It can stack multiple links in floating bubbles when you open them and then partially load them in background!
Just set Chromer as your default browser, Chromer will display the link in a non-intrusive way. Or choose Chromer when needed.
Faster loading, non-intrusive, saves data, shared login info from Chrome, auto complete forms and SECURE with latest updates!
You can easily choose how you want Chromer to work by launching the main screen!
Set Chromer as default to open all links, or you can choose Chromer from the list when it is shown
is set as the default browser, please clear it by clicking clear defaults.
Keep your browser in memory for faster launch
Tap the circle button to preview changes
Scan your screen for links and load them in background for instant launch

This service will be used by Chromer to scan text links on your screen and load them in the background. No other information is processed by Chromer. You can still use Chromer in light mode if you choose to not grant this. For more information, launch Chromer app.

To allow Chromer to scan for links in any app, it requires you to grant accessibility service permission. Please grant accessibility permission in the next screen, after which you can enable this option and enjoy quick launches.
Show notification when a link is prefetched
To enable dynamic coloring of toolbar, Chromer learns the colors silently. It might not come initially for a website or an app, but it will improve over time with usage. Enjoy!
Chromer is the current default browser
%1$s set as your favorite share app!
%1$s will be used to provide Custom Tabs!
Color will be based on website if the site supports it else will be based on app
Color will be based on app that launches the website
Color will be based on the launched website
To enable dynamic coloring of toolbar based on apps, Chromer needs your permission to know the apps you are using. Would you like to grant this permission now?
To enable blacklisting of apps, Chromer needs your permission to know the apps you are using. Would like to grant usage access permission now?
Choose where the web heads initially appears
To draw the web heads on screen, screen overlay permission needs to be granted. Would you like to grant it now?
When you open a link in any app, a floating bubble called web head will be created on screen and Chromer will attempt to pre fetch the link.
On opening multiple links, these web heads will automatically stack on each other as shown. You can open these links later by tapping them.
When you start dragging a web head, a trash will be shown. Drop on this trash to delete the web head.
Chromer prioritizes the last opened link and pre-fetches it. The recommended method is to click the web heads one by one from top to bottom. Enabling close web heads on launch wil make this seamless.
To open links in floating bubbles, Chromer needs drawing over other apps permission, please grant to continue or disable Web Heads in Chromer settings.

Beta releases are experimental builds that has the latest features but has few bugs. You can contribute to the development by joining as tester and then reporting bugs you face in the Google+ Community. 

Please make sure you have joined the Google+ community, and then click the become a tester button to go to Google Play testing link. 

NOTE: You have to join the community to become a tester.
No compatible voice recognition apps found
You have blacklisted this app from launching in Chromer and have not set a secondary browser. Please choose a browser to continue.
Could not share to the app, defaulting to normal share
Launching links from a blacklisted app will open them in your secondary browser
You can now revoke Chromer\'s accessibility service permission.
See your tabs with other recent apps on your phone\'s Overview screen.
Shows an additional toolbar with extra options
Invalid link, have you copied any text or link by long pressing the page?

To ensure bottom bar works properly, setting latest Chrome version as custom tab provider is recommended. Older versions and other browsers may not work. 
 
Bottom bar provides two actions: 

Open in new tab (5.0+) - Copy a link or text on screen and press this icon to launch the link or search the text in a new custom tab.
Share - Quickly perform Android share action. 

 More actions coming soon.
